title: Amazon's new AI review summarizer could help you empty your pockets even faster
description: Only available to a few users in the US, Amazon's new tool will break down dozens of reviews into one condensed paragraph.

title: "Bulletproof " Lolek hosting site seized as the global fight against ransomware steps up
description: LolekHosted allegedly enabled at least 400 cyberattacks and turned a blind eye on users' activities - here's what we know so far.

title: Mounting reports of iPhone 14 battery issues threaten to spoil Apple's iPhone 15 launch party
description: Apple's iPhone 14 Pro faces reports of rapidly dwindling battery health just weeks ahead of the new iPhone's expected launch date.

title: Saints Row: The Third co-writer Drew Holmes becomes Far Cry IP director
description: Drew Holmes, co-writer of Saints Row: The Third and lead writer of Far Cry 5, is now Far Cry's IP director.

title: Free speech under siege in Jordan as king approves "draconian" new cybercrime law
description: The law "will strongly undermine digital rights," says human rights advocates. Here's what's at stake for people in Jordan as the new law will be soon enforced.

title: Apple’s M3 Ultra chips promise a huge performance jump - if rumors are true

description: Here are some of the announcements we expect to hear at Meta Connect 2023.

description: Your restaurant isn't getting suspended from TripAdvisor, it's a ruse to get you to download malware.

title: One of Apple's basic security tools is failing at its job

title: Snapdragon 8 Gen 3's rumored price means phones may stick with 8 Gen 2 for longer
